A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pacing\, irrelevant non consequential subplotlines (Poe mutiny and Finn/Rose)\, underuse of Mark Hamil and raising more questions than answers holds this movie back and will be most Star Wars fan's least favorite movie.

3 minutes of lightsabers with no true duel\, not acceptable.

2 minutes of Phasma\, sure glad we got connected to that character.
5 minutes of X-wing and space dogfights\, not acceptable.
No funeral or remembrence of Han\, limited character development.
